attributes.action: Full pay for anyone who has to take time off because of coronavirus not just ssp
attributes.additional_details: Family will not cope financially on ssp and all will go into debt
attributes.background: Full pay for everyone that has to self isolate not just ssp  this does not cover Bills or freeze all Bill's for 3 months

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
